tests.prompt: Create a Fighter character. Verify character.Data includes armor proficiencies (light, medium, heavy, shields) and weapon proficiencies (simple, martial).
Create a Barbarian character. Verify character.Data includes armor proficiencies (light, medium, shields - NOT heavy) and weapon proficiencies (simple, martial).
Create a Monk character. Verify character.Data includes NO armor proficiencies and weapon proficiencies (simple, shortsword).
Create a Fighter, serialize to JSON via ToData(), reload via LoadFromData(). Verify proficiencies are preserved.
